clusters.name: Abell1689
clusters.notes:
Official Lenstool release (J. Richard et al.). Place the tarball at the
path above; the holdout pipeline will unpack and build kappa_obs.fits.

clusters.name: CL0024
clusters.notes:
Uses the public Lenstool model (Zitrin et al. 2009). Provide the tarball
at the given location before running the pipeline.

clusters.name: Bullet
clusters.notes:
Baseline holdout already configured. Added here for completeness and to
keep the reproducibility pipeline declarative.

clusters.name: MACSJ0416
clusters.notes:
New collision cluster. Requires Lenstool tarball (or FITS with
kappa/gamma grids) before the automated holdout step can execute.

clusters.name: AbellS1063
clusters.notes:
Additional massive system for generalisation. Provide κ maps plus
omega_cut/sigma_e grids under data/cluster/AbellS1063/.
